00026 #include "OgreSDLTextureManager.h"
00027 
00028 namespace Ogre {
00029     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030     SDLTextureManager::SDLTextureManager()
00031         : TextureManager()
00032     {
00033     }
00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     SDLTextureManager::~SDLTextureManager()
00036     {
00037         this->unloadAndDestroyAll();
00038     }
00039     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040     Resource* SDLTextureManager::create( const String& name)
00041     {
00042         SDLTexture* t = new SDLTexture(name);
00043         t->enable32Bit(mIs32Bit);
00044         return t;
00045     }
00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     void SDLTextureManager::unloadAndDestroyAll()
00048     {
00049         // Unload & delete resources in turn
00050         for (ResourceMap::iterator i = mResources.begin(); i != mResources.end(); ++i)
00051         {
00052             i->second->unload();
00053             delete i->second;
00054         }
00055 
00056         // Empty the list
00057         mResources.clear();
00058     }
00059 }
